# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(pacman LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(pacman "")
set_target_properties(pacman PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "pacman")
set_target_properties(pacman PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build")
target_include_directories(pacman PRIVATE
    C:/CXXLib/SFML/include
    C:/CXXLib/SFML/include/SFML
    Src/include
)
target_compile_options(pacman PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-std=c++17>
)
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET pacman PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(pacman PRIVATE
    sfml-graphics
    sfml-system
    sfml-window
)
target_link_directories(pacman PRIVATE
    C:/CXXLib/SFML/lib
)
target_link_options(pacman PRIVATE
    -m64
    -mwindows
)
target_sources(pacman PRIVATE
    Src/ConvertSketch.cpp
    Src/DrawMap.cpp
    Src/DrawText.cpp
    Src/Ghost.cpp
    Src/GhostManager.cpp
    Src/Main.cpp
    Src/MapCollision.cpp
    Src/Pacman.cpp
)

add_custom_command(
  TARGET pacman POST_BUILD
  COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E copy_directory 
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}/Resources
  ${CMAKE_CURRENT_BINARY_DIR}/Resources
)
